TopicTitle: KSP No puedo cambiar el idioma v1.12 Private Division Launcher

Articles.Content:
Buenas, He tenido un problema, he intentado por todos los medios cambiar el idioma de mi KSP pero no encuentro la opción, según en otras entradas del foro  ya esta disponible la versión oficial de la traducción pero no la encuentro, y me parece extraño ya que en la pagina de Private Division dice que el juego esta disponible en español, si alguien podría guiarme en esto disculpen las molestias.  

Quote

Hi, I've had a problem, I've tried by all means to change the language of my KSP but I can't find the option, according to other forum entries the official version of the translation is already available but I can't find it, and it already seems strange to me that on the Private Division page it says that the game is available in Spanish, if someone could guide me on this, sorry for the inconvenience. 

 

Edited January 7, 2023 by Vanamonde
The latest news that I heard is that they're aware of problems with the non-English versions from Epic and are working on the problem.

If you don't want to wait for a fix and want to play KSP in your language, check this : https://github.com/Apofoo/KSP-Localization

It requires you to download the language file and edit your settings, took me 5 minutes.

I hope they will fix it soon.
